thread.title: Beyoncé Says Her Goal Is to ‘Give a Voice to Our Pain’ in Her Grammy Acceptance Speech
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Says Her Goal Is to ‘Give a Voice to Our Pain’ in Her Grammy Acceptance Speech

author: Jackson McHenry
title: Beyoncé Says Her Goal Is to ‘Give a Voice to Our Pain’ in Her Grammy Acceptance Speech
text: After her mesmerizing Grammys performance , Beyoncé returned to the mortal world to accept her Grammy for Best Urban Contemporary Album. Reading, of course, from a gold card that matched her outfit, Beyoncé thanked “everyone who worked so hard to beautifully capture the profundity of deep Southern culture” and... More »
